title: Which is a grade A college of Ipu in Greater Noida? - Quora

response.answer_text: KCC Institute can be considered as the paradise for under graduate students looking for that impeccable opportunity in their life. This college has everything for students that they require in their entire college duration. In these three years span, students will specialize in a lot of things that they could have never imagined.  Let me first start with the affiliation of the college. KCC Institute is affiliated to IP University which is a state government university of Delhi. This means that all students graduating from here will be receiving their degrees from state government University and this has immense value for their career prospects. Grade ‘A’ College of GGSIPU, KCC is been awarded for providing quality education of a particular specification in the field of education sector for many years now. College academics are very strong and KCC Institutes mostly focus on practical learning with latest techniques. · Great focus has been laid while selecting the finest of faculty available. · KCC has laid a lot of emphasis on the establishment of its centers for research and development. · The course work is also combined with Regular industrial visits, Seminars, Conferences, Guest lectures, Workshops, Presentations, Group discussion, Industrial Training, etc. · Special programs are conducted to improve student's Personality and over all development. · It has achieved nearly 90% placements record every year. · It has excellent and state-of-the-art infrastructure. · As a part of the ‘Career Skills Workshop Series’ this college also provides practical workshops on new-age technical skills to help students understand the 'in-demand skills' and new-age careers options. · Your chances of getting into KCCILHE are brighter than you think. TRAINING ALLIANCES IN KCCILHE- KCC Institutes have collaborated with various national and international companies to give students 10 pieces of training on the campus. This training is extremely beneficial for students to give extra knowledge apart from their course. Training professionals come to campus to teach students and also grants certificates, which impacts your resume a lot. · AUTODESK · TEXAS INSTRUMENTS · E-YANTRA · RED ACADEMY · POWER SYSTEM LAB · CISCO · ORACLE ACADEMY · SPOKEN TUTORIAL PROGRAMME · MICROSOFT IMAGINE ACADEMY · NPTEL Dedicated placement cell- The entire placement cell works towards providing placement and internship opportunities to the students in organizations like UTV, Network 18, Bajaj capital, Yes bank, LG, Bharti. Apart from arranging placements for the students, the placement cell maintains regular interaction with: the industry, organizing visits, guest lectures, workshops, and seminars   THANKS….

Only one college is the best college under IPU in Greater Noida, and that is KCC Institute of Legal and Higher Education.  My cousin sister has completed her BCA from KCCILHE, and she says that along with this college course curriculum also provides training on many valuable specializations. The cell has so many tie-ups with many reputed and renowned industries and companies to give a heap of placement opportunities to its students in order to enrich the chances of being placed at a good designation with a handsome salary package. It has a unique and dedicated Placement Cell which concerns all training and placement related activities in the college premises. KCC organizes Industrial visit every year to engineering students in different companies. It conducts seminars on various topics and planning to have collaboration with foreign companies in education and other matters for the mutual benefits of each other. It provides its college students with a bunch of facilities which are much useful for their easy stay at the college campus during their academic years. Some of the facilities are such as Library, Computer Center, Laboratory, Games & Sports, Hostel facilities, Canteen, Yoga classes, Transportation facilities, Medical facilities, Extra-Curricular activities, and many more. Teachers in KCC are well-qualified with experience of about 10-15 years in the corporate sector as well as in the teaching sector. Its meandering educational campus is spread in excess of 40 acres. It is the best college on different parameters like placements, faculty quality, exam pattern, graduation outcome, etc. The college has excellent and state-of-the-art infrastructure.  Thankyou.
